fact.description: The first-half is just kicking off.
Milorad Mazic signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
Milorad Mazic signals a free kick to Argentina.
Throw-in Argentina.
Play has been resumed.
Throw-in for Iran in their own half.
Angel Di Maria is back on the pitch.
Attention is being given to Argentina’s Angel Di Maria and play has been suspended briefly.
Argentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Iran.
Ball goes out of play for a Argentina goal kick.
Argentina have a dangerous throw-in.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Iran territory.
Iran have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Argentina at Mineirao Stadium.
Goal kick for Iran at Mineirao Stadium.
Ball safe as Iran is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Argentina awarded a free kick in their own half.

Milorad Mazic awards Iran a goal kick.
Can Argentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Iran's half?
Important block from the Iran defence as Lionel Messi fires in a strike for Argentina.
Milorad Mazic awards Iran a goal kick.
Argentina have a goal kick.
In Belo Horizonte Argentina drive forward through Gonzalo Higuain. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Alireza Haghighi is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The match at Mineirao Stadium is underway again.
Iran's Alireza Haghighi is back in action after a slight knock.
Milorad Mazic signals a Argentina throw-in in Iran's half.
Can Iran get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Argentina's half?
Throw-in for Iran close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Iran.
Angel Di Maria for Argentina gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Iran at Mineirao Stadium.
Milorad Mazic signals a Argentina throw-in in Iran's half.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Iran territory.
Can Argentina capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Iran's half?
Iran needs to be cautious. Argentina have an attacking throw-in.
Sergio Aguero of Argentina smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Argentina have been awarded a corner by Milorad Mazic.
Argentina attack but Marcos Rojo's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Iran goal kick.
Argentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Milorad Mazic awards Iran a goal kick.
Argentina drive upfield and Angel Di Maria gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Iran defender.
Argentina have been awarded a corner by Milorad Mazic.
Ezequiel Garay (Argentina) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Iran goal kick.
Throw-in Argentina.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Iran territory.
Goal kick for Iran at Mineirao Stadium.
Lionel Messi (Argentina) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Argentina capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Free kick Iran.
Argentina's Lionel Messi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Iran have a goal kick.
Argentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Argentina are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Belo Horizonte, Ezequiel Garay (Argentina) misses the target with a header.

Milorad Mazic signals a Argentina throw-in in Iran's half.
Milorad Mazic signals a free kick to Iran.
Corner awarded to Iran.
Iran surge into the attack at Mineirao Stadium but Jalal Hosseini’s header is off-target.
Milorad Mazic awards Argentina a goal kick.
Ball safe as Argentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Argentina have been awarded a corner by Milorad Mazic.
Federico Fernandez (Argentina) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Iran goal kick.
Throw-in for Iran in their own half.

Iran's Ehsan Haji Safi misses with an attempt on goal.
The first half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.

The first-half has ended.
Milorad Mazic signals a throw-in for Argentina, close to Iran's area.
Throw-in for Argentina close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Argentina.
Ball goes out of play for a Iran goal kick.
Throw-in for Argentina in their own half.
Argentina are coming forward and Pablo Zabaleta gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Iran at Mineirao Stadium.
Iran awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Argentina.
Reza Ghoochannejhad (Iran) strikes at Mineirao Stadium but his header is cleared.
Javad Nekounam (Iran) has received a yellow card from Milorad Mazic.
Argentina have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Argentina.
Ball safe as Argentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Milorad Mazic awards Iran a goal kick.

Can Iran get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Argentina's half?
Iran drive forward but Mehrdad Pooladi is judged offside.
Can Argentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Iran's half?
Goal kick for Iran at Mineirao Stadium.
In Belo Horizonte, Angel Di Maria of Argentina is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Iran have a goal kick.
Argentina's Lionel Messi breaks free at Mineirao Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.

Iran to take a throw-in in Argentina territory.

Corner awarded to Iran.

Iran push forward at Mineirao Stadium and Ashkan Dejagah gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Argentina defence.
Iran have been awarded a corner by Milorad Mazic.
Can Argentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Iran's half?
Argentina have been awarded a corner by Milorad Mazic.
Throw-in Argentina.

Corner awarded to Iran.

Free kick in a good position for Argentina!
Masoud Shojaei for Iran has been booked by Milorad Mazic and receives a first yellow card.
Milorad Mazic signals a Argentina throw-in in Iran's half.
In Belo Horizonte Argentina attack through Lionel Messi. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Iran at Mineirao Stadium.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Iran territory.
Angel Di Maria gets his shot on target but fails to score for Argentina.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Andranik Timotian.
Khosro Heydari is replacing Masoud Shojaei for Iran at Mineirao Stadium.
The match in Belo Horizonte is underway once more.
Andranik Timotian has recovered and rejoins the match in Belo Horizonte.
Argentina make their first substitution with Ezequiel Lavezzi replacing Sergio Aguero.
Rodrigo Sebastian Palacio is on a sub for Gonzalo Higuain for Argentina.

Marcos Rojo of Argentina gets in a strike, but is off target.

Ball safe as Iran is awarded a throw-in in their half.

Iran make their third substitution with Reza Haghighi replacing Ehsan Haji Safi.
Ball goes out of play for a Iran goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the second half.
Ezequiel Lavezzi instrumental with a fine assist.
Lucas Biglia is on a sub for Angel Di Maria for Argentina.

Milorad Mazic signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the second half.
The match has come to a close in Belo Horizonte. The final score is 1-0.
